University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Engravings of George Washington, Accession #10213-c, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased by the Library from Colburn & Tegg, Hollis N.Y. in 1977.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: George Washington: born at his father's plantation on Popes Creek in Westmoreland County, Virginia, on February 22, 1732; commander of the Continental Army June 1775-December 23, 1783; president of the Constitutional Convention; served two terms as President, 1789-1797; died December 14, 1799 at Mount Vernon.

Martha Washington: born on June 2, 1731, at Chestnut Grove Plantation in New Kent Country, Virginia; married Daniel Parke Custis, 1749; married George Washington at her home, White House, on January 6, 1759; died May 22, 1802.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of 27 engravings and lithographs of George Washington, Martha Washington, the Washington family and Mount Vernon.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in three series: Series I: George Washington; Series II: Martha Washington; and, Series III: Washington Family and Mount Vernon. Each series is arranged chronologically.
